simple_summary: Summarize the main themes of Romeo and Juliet.
detailed_instructions: Provide a detailed analysis of Romeo and Juliet's main themes. Include specific examples from the text.
formatted_output: List the top 3 themes from Romeo and Juliet. For each theme, provide: 1) Theme name, 2) Brief description, 3) Key scene example.
specific_length: In exactly 100 words, explain why Romeo and Juliet is considered a tragedy.
